content: this stylish crochet dog sweater pattern comes in sizes xs s and m and is worked from the neck down all in one piece with no sewing involved i call that a win friends pattern written using us terms the chain at the beginning of the row does not count as a stitch front post/back post stitches are used for the collar there is a tutorial for these stitches here https //hearthookhome com/crochet-front-post-and-back-post-crochet-stitches/
